knowledge.title: Safeplace Default
knowledge.description: This knowledgebase describes all the relevant types of buildings and associated risks.

question.description: Are there children that regularly visit the building?
How old are the children that visit the building?

rule.description: Babies (between the age of 0-2) visit the building.
Small children (between age of 2-4) visit the building.
Medium children (between age of 4-12) visit the building.
Big children (older than 12) visit the building.
Non-autonomous children (younger than 12) visit the building.

risk.name: Ondergrond: Kind struikelt over oneffenheid
Ondergrond: Kind glijdt uit over gladde/natte ondergrond
Muur: Kind bezeert zich aan oneffenheid
Deur: Kind botst tegen de deur
Deur: Kind valt door glas in deur
Deur: Kind krijgt zijn vingers tussen de deur
Garderobe: Kind botst tegen kapstokhaak
Verwarming: Kind verbrandt zich aan hete radiator/buizen
Verwarming: Kind botst of valt tegen radiator
Verwarming: Kind komt met hand klem te zitten tussen radiator
Verlichting: Kind struikelt door onvoldoende licht
Verlichting: Lamp wordt stukgegooid en glas valt naar beneden
Elektra: Kind komt in contact met elektriciteit
Elektra: Kind trekt aan elektr. snoer, krijgt apparaat op zich
Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet van giftige plant
Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet sigaretten of medicijnen uit tas
Meubilair: Kind stoot zich tegen meubilair
Meubilair: Kind krijgt splinter in vinger
Meubilair: Kind valt tijdens het in of uit stoel klimmen
Meubilair: Kind valt uit een hoge stoel
Meubilair: Kind valt met hoge stoel en al om doordat het zich afzet tegen de tafel
Meubilair: Kast valt om en kind komt onder de kast terecht
Meubilair: Decorstuk valt op kind
Raam: Kind raakt verstrikt in koordjes v/d raamdecoratie
Verbranding: Kind heeft toegang tot lucifers/aansteker
Overig: Kind botst tegen een ander kind
Overig: Kind rent tegen een obstakel
Overig: Kind stopt kleine voorwerpen in de mond
Overig: Kind struikelt over buggy
Overig: Kind rent ongezien naar buiten
Overig: Kind wordt door huisdier gebeten
Trap: Kind valt doordat het niet bij de trapleuning kan
Trap: Kind valt doordat de trapleuning niet goed vast zit
Trap: Kind struikelt over een kapotte trede
Trap: Kind glijdt uit op een gladde trede
Trap: Kind raakt bekneld tussen de treden v/d trap
Trap: Kind valt (van de zijkant) van de trap af
Trap: Kind raakt bekneld tussen de spijlen v/d balustrade
Raam: Kind valt door ruit
Raam: Kind valt uit open raam
Speelgoed: Kind zit met voet tussen wiel kinderfiets
Speelgoed: Kind wordt door een fietsend kind omver gereden
Speelgoed: Kind stopt kraaltjes/ander klein speelgoed in de mond
Speelgoed: Speengedeelte wordt van speen afgebeten en kind krijgt deze achter in de keel
Speelgoed: Kind krijgt koordjes om de nek
Speelgoed: Kind verwondt zich aan scherp speelgoed of splinters aan speelgoed
Speelgoed: Kind of leidster struikelt over speelgoed
Speelgoed: Kind krijgt poppenhuis op zich
Ondergrond: Kind glijdt uit over gladde/natte ondergrond
Verbranding: Kind verbrandt zich aan warmwaterkraan
Giftige Stoffen: Kind drinkt van schoonmaakmiddel
Giftige Stoffen: Kind heeft toegang tot lotions of alcohol
Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet van toiletblokje
Overig: Kind stopt kleine voorwerpen in de mond
Overig: Kind snuffelt in afvalbakje
Ankleedtafel: Kind draait zich van de aankleedtafel af
Ankleedtafel: Kind rolt aan de achterkant van de aankleedtafel af
Ankleedtafel: Kind stoot zich aan (scherpe) hoek van de aankleedtafel
Ankleedtafel: De aankleedtafel is niet stabiel en valt om
Ankleedtafel: De aankleedtafel is niet stevig en stort in
Ankleedtafel: Een opklapbare aankleedtafel klapt tijdens gebruik in
Ankleedtafel: Kind komt in hoogte verstelbare aankleedtafel bekneld te zitten
Ankleedtafel: Kind valt van trapje van aankleedtafel
Ankleedtafel: Kind klautert zonder toezicht op aankleedtafel
Verbranding: Kind krijgt hete thee over zich heen
Overig: Kind stikt in stukje eten
Overig: Kind snijdt zich aan kantoorartikelen
Verbranding: Kind brandt zich aan kookplaat
Verbranding: Kind trekt pan van het fornuis
Verbranding: Kind brandt zich aan oven
Verbranding: Kind loopt brandworden op door de waterkoker over zich heen te trekken
Verbranding: Kind heeft toegang tot lucifers/aansteker
Verbranding: Kind verbrandt zich aan warmwaterkraan
Verbranding: Kind krijgt hete thee over zich heen
Ondergrond: Kind glijdt uit over gladde/natte ondergrond
Giftige Stoffen: Kind drinkt van schoonmaakmiddel
Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet sigaretten of medicijnen uit tas
Giftige Stoffen: Kind krijgt giftige stoffen binnen omdat voedsel naast gevaarlijke stoffen wordt opgeborgen
Overig: Kind snuffelt in afvalbakje
Overig: Kind trekt plastic zak over het hoofd
Overig: Kind stopt kleine voorwerpen in de mond
Overig: Kind snijdt zich aan kantoorartikelen
Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet muizengif
Giftige Stoffen: Kind drinkt van schoonmaakmiddel
Giftige Stoffen: Kind krijgt giftige stoffen binnen omdat voedsel naast gevaarlijke stoffen wordt opgeborgen
Meubilair: Kast valt om en kind komt onder de kast terecht
Verbranding: Kind verbrandt zich aan warmwaterkraan
Berging: Kind klimt in wasdroger/machine
Berging: Kind verbrandt zich aan de cv-ketel
Berging: Kind bezeert zich aan opgeslagen speelgoed/materiaal
Berging: Kind bezeert zich aan gereedschap
Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet muizengif
Meubilair: Kast valt om en kind komt onder de kast terecht
Berging: Kind bezeert zich aan opgeslagen speelgoed/materiaal
Berging: Kind bezeert zich aan gereedschap
Ondergrond: Kind struikelt over een boomwortel
Ondergrond: Kind struikelt over oneffenheid
Ondergrond: Kind glijdt uit over gladde/natte ondergrond
Overig: Kind rent tegen een obstakel
Overig: Kind botst tegen een ander kind
Overig: Kind wordt omver gelopen
Overig: Kind verbrandt zich in de zon
Overig: Kind bezeert zich aan zwerfvuil
Overig: Kind raakt te water
Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet van giftige plant
Speeltoestel: Kind valt van toestel
Speeltoestel: Kind valt door defect materiaal
Speeltoestel: Kind komt met nek klem te zitten traptreden
Speeltoestel: Kind verwondt zich aan scherpe randen
Speeltoestel: Vinger komt klem te zitten bij schommel
Speeltoestel: Kind raakt bekneld tussen veerwip
Speeltoestel: Kind valt van de veerwip door defect materiaal
Speeltoestel: Kind blijft met koordje/ketting hangen
Speeltoestel: Kind krijgt splinter in hand
Speeltoestel: Kind struikelt over speeltoestel
Speeltoestel: Kind botst tegen een speeltoestel
Speeltoestel: Kind botst tegen ander kind op schommel
Speeltoestel: Vinger van kind komt klem in holle buis
Speeltoestel: Kind snijdt zich aan zwerfvuil in de zandbak
Speeltoestel: Kind stoot zich tegen rand van de zandbak
Speeltoestel: Kind botst tegen veerwip
Omheining: Kind doet poortje van het hek open en rent de straat op
Omheining: Het hek blijft openstaan en kind loopt de straat op
Omheining: Kind bezeert zich aan omheining
Omheining: Kind kruipt onder de omheining en komt klem te zitten
Omheining: Kind kruipt tussen de spijlen en komt klem te zitten
Omheining: Kind klimt op de omheining en valt
Omheining: Kind klimt over de omheining
Omgeving: Kind moet oversteken tussen geparkeerde autos
Omgeving: Kind rent de weg op als het wordt opgehaald
Omgeving: Kind raakt betrokken bij ongeval bij een uitstapje buiten de deur

rule.description: No children, no advice from this knowledge base.
If it is a multistory building and children have access to the stairs, the stair-risks may be important.
If there are sanitary rooms and small children visit the building, ask for Ankleedtafel.

question.description: Does the building have multiple stories?
Do children have access to any stairs?
Does the building have windows in rooms accessible to children?
Are the lowest windows more or less than 1m above the ground?
Is it possible to fall through the window because the glass is thin, the windows are sometimes left open and/or there are no bars in front of it?
Are children playing with toys in the building?
Does the building have sanitary facilities for adults?
Does the building have sanitary facilities for children?
Do the sanitary facilities have diaper-changing tables?
Are children eating in the building?
Are adults eating in the building?
Are meals prepared in the building?
Does the building have specific rooms for storing toys, tools or cleaning equipment?
Does the building have rooms/huts for storing toys or tools outside?
Does the building have rooms for storing toys or tools inside?
Does the building have an outer area that children have access to?
Are playground structures in the outside area, e.g. swings or a sandbox?
Is there a fence around the outer area?
Are trips with children starting or ending at the location in question?
Do children come to the building or leave the building without one of their guardians (e.g. do they go to the building after school)?

checklist_item.name: Trap: Kind valt doordat het niet bij de trapleuning kan
checklist_item.description: Stairs: Child falls because it cannot reach the guardrail.
checklist_item.advice: Change the guardrail to the prescribed sizes.

checklist_item.name: Trap: Kind valt doordat de trapleuning niet goed vast zit
checklist_item.description: Stairs: Child falls because the guardrail is not properly secured to the wall.
checklist_item.advice: Secure the guardrail properly.

checklist_item.name: Trap: Kind struikelt over een kapotte trede
checklist_item.description: Stairs: Child falls over a broken step.
checklist_item.advice: Repair the step.

checklist_item.name: Trap: Kind glijdt uit op een gladde trede
checklist_item.description: Stairs: Child slips over a slippery step.
checklist_item.advice: Place a rough strip on the steps/dry properly after cleaning/make sure children do not use the stairs unsupervised.

checklist_item.name: Trap: Kind raakt bekneld tussen de treden v/d trap
checklist_item.description: Stairs: Child gets stuck between steps.
checklist_item.advice: Adjust stairs to prescribed sizes/make sure children do not use the stairs unsupervised.

checklist_item.name: Trap: Kind valt (van de zijkant) van de trap af
checklist_item.description: Stairs: Child falls of (the side of) the stairs.
checklist_item.advice: Place a guardrail or side wall. Make sure children do not use the stairs unsupervised.

checklist_item.name: Trap: Kind raakt bekneld tussen de spijlen v/d balustrade
checklist_item.description: Stairs: Child gets stuck between the balusters of the balustrade.
checklist_item.advice: If the space between balusters is larger than the allowed amount, adjust the spacing.

checklist_item.name: Ondergrond: Kind struikelt over oneffenheid
checklist_item.description: Ground: Child trips over a rough patch.
checklist_item.advice: Make agreements to keep the ground clean. Get the ground fixed if necessary.

checklist_item.name: Ondergrond: Kind glijdt uit over gladde/natte ondergrond
checklist_item.description: Ground: Child slips over wet/slippery surface.
checklist_item.advice: Do not mop the floor when children are around.

checklist_item.name: Muur: Kind bezeert zich aan oneffenheid
checklist_item.description: Wall: Child hurts itself on a rough patch.
checklist_item.advice: Remove any pointy bits of the wall. If necessary, treat the wall.

checklist_item.name: Garderobe: Kind botst tegen kapstokhaak
checklist_item.description: Wardrobe: Child bumps into a coat hanger.
checklist_item.advice: Cover the hangers with a sheet or buy hangers that can be turned the other way around.

checklist_item.name: Deur: Kind krijgt zijn vingers tussen de deur
checklist_item.description: Door: Child gets fingers stuck between door.
checklist_item.advice: Install finger safety.

checklist_item.name: Raam: Kind valt door ruit
checklist_item.description: Window: Child falls through a window.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure the window can only be opened by a limited amount (child safety lock). Make any windows at child height are difficult to reach (don't place any stools etc).

checklist_item.name: Raam: Kind valt uit open raam
checklist_item.description: Window: Child falls out of an open window.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure the window can only be opened by a limited amount (child safety lock). Make any windows at child height difficult to reach (don't place any stools etc).

checklist_item.name: Raam: Kind raakt verstrikt in koordjes v/d raamdecoratie
checklist_item.description: Window: Child gets entangled in cords of the window decor.
checklist_item.advice: Place the cords in such a way that children cannot get to it.

checklist_item.name: Verwarming: Kind verbrandt zich aan hete radiator/buizen
checklist_item.description: Heating: Child burns itself on radiator (piping).
checklist_item.advice: Make sure children cannot reach radiators by placing furniture in front of the radiator or by placing sheets in front of them.

checklist_item.name: Verwarming: Kind botst of valt tegen radiator
checklist_item.description: Heating: Child bumps into or falls onto radiator.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure there is enough room to walk. Make sure children cannot reach radiators by placing furniture in front of the radiator or by placing sheets in front of them.

checklist_item.name: Verlichting: Kind struikelt door onvoldoende licht
checklist_item.description: Lighting: Child trips due to insufficient lighting.
checklist_item.advice: Replace broken light bulbs immediately.

checklist_item.name: Verlichting: Lamp wordt stukgegooid en glas valt naar beneden
checklist_item.description: Lighting: A lamp gets broken by someone throwing something and glass comes down.
checklist_item.advice: Cover the light so that nothing can be thrown against it.

checklist_item.name: Elektra: Kind komt in contact met elektriciteit
checklist_item.description: Electrics: A child gets into contact with electricity.
checklist_item.advice: Secure outlets or place outlets above the prescribed children's reach height.

checklist_item.name: Giftige Stoffen: Kind drinkt van schoonmaakmiddel
checklist_item.description: Toxic substances: Child drinks a cleaning agent.
checklist_item.advice: Store cleaning agents out of reach of children.

checklist_item.name: Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet van giftige plant
checklist_item.description: Toxic substances: Child eats from a poisonous plant.
checklist_item.advice: Do not keep plants at the building. Any poisonous outdoor plants need to be placed out of reach of children or removed.

checklist_item.name: Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet muizengif
checklist_item.description: Toxic substances: Child eats rat poison.
checklist_item.advice: If rat poison has to be used make sure it is out of reach of children.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind stopt kleine voorwerpen in de mond
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child puts small object into its mouth.
checklist_item.advice: Do not keep small objects lying around.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind struikelt over buggy
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child trips over buggy.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure buggies are moved to the side and not left in the walking space.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind rent ongezien naar buiten
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child runs outside unnoticed.
checklist_item.advice: Keep the door locked/accompany children when arriving and leaving/keep a close eye on children.

checklist_item.name: Deur: Kind botst tegen de deur
checklist_item.description: Door: Child runs into the door.
checklist_item.advice: Create enough walking space and maintain said walking space.

checklist_item.name: Deur: Kind valt door glas in deur
checklist_item.description: Door: Child falls through glass in door.
checklist_item.advice: Put safety foil on the glass.

checklist_item.name: Verwarming: Kind komt met hand klem te zitten tussen radiator
checklist_item.description: Heating: Child gets its hand stuck in the radiator.
checklist_item.advice: Make the radiator inaccessible to children.

checklist_item.name: Elektra: Kind trekt aan elektr. snoer, krijgt apparaat op zich
checklist_item.description: Electrics: Child pulls on electric wire, device falls onto child.
checklist_item.advice: Place water-boilers etc. in such a way that they are inaccessible to children, for instance behind the counter.

checklist_item.name: Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet sigaretten of medicijnen uit tas
checklist_item.description: Toxic substances: Child eats cigarettes or medicines from cupboard or bag.
checklist_item.advice: Keep cigarettes and medicines out of reach of children.

checklist_item.name: Meubilair: Kind stoot zich tegen meubilair
checklist_item.description: Furniture: Child runs into furniture.
checklist_item.advice: Create and maintain sufficient walking space.

checklist_item.name: Meubilair: Kind krijgt splinter in vinger
checklist_item.description: Furniture: Child gets a splinter in a finger.
checklist_item.advice: Check furniture on a monthly basis, repair or remove/replace if necessary.

checklist_item.name: Meubilair: Kind valt tijdens het in of uit stoel klimmen
checklist_item.description: Furniture: Child falls while trying to climb in or out of a chair.
checklist_item.advice: Accompany children trying to get in or out of chairs.

checklist_item.name: Meubilair: Kind valt uit een hoge stoel
checklist_item.description: Furniture: Child falls out of high chair.
checklist_item.advice: Do not place highly active children in high chairs.

checklist_item.name: Meubilair: Kind valt met hoge stoel en al om doordat het zich afzet tegen de tafel
checklist_item.description: Furniture: Child falls together with high chair because it pushed itself away from a table.
checklist_item.advice: Place chairs further from tables/get custom furniture.

checklist_item.name: Meubilair: Kast valt om en kind komt onder de kast terecht
checklist_item.description: Furniture: Closet falls and traps child under it.
checklist_item.advice: Anchor closets to the floor.

checklist_item.name: Meubilair: Decorstuk valt op kind
checklist_item.description: Furniture: Piece of decor falls onto a child.
checklist_item.advice: Check decor mothly. Repair or remove when necessary.

checklist_item.name: Speelgoed: Kind zit met voet tussen wiel kinderfiets
checklist_item.description: Toys: Child gets foot stuck in childrens bike wheel.
checklist_item.advice: Do not use children's bikes in kindergarten.

checklist_item.name: Speelgoed: Kind wordt door een fietsend kind omver gereden
checklist_item.description: Toys: Child gets run over by a biking child.
checklist_item.advice: Do not use children's bikes in kindergarten.

checklist_item.name: Speelgoed: Kind stopt kraaltjes/ander klein speelgoed in de mond
checklist_item.description: Toys: Child puts beads/other small toys in their mouths.
checklist_item.advice: Do not leave things lying around. Make sure the supervisors are BHV certified.

checklist_item.name: Speelgoed: Speengedeelte wordt van speen afgebeten en kind krijgt deze achter in de keel
checklist_item.description: Toys: The suckle of a pacifier gets bitten of and a child gets it into their throat.
checklist_item.advice: N/A

checklist_item.name: Speelgoed: Kind krijgt koordjes om de nek
checklist_item.description: Toys: Child gets small cords around its neck.
checklist_item.advice: All cords need to conform to the prescribed maximum length.

checklist_item.name: Speelgoed: Kind verwondt zich aan scherp speelgoed of splinters aan speelgoed
checklist_item.description: Toys: Child hurts itself with a sharp toy or gets splinters from toy in its finger.
checklist_item.advice: Check the toys monthly, repair or remove toys when necessary.

checklist_item.name: Speelgoed: Kind of leidster struikelt over speelgoed
checklist_item.description: Toys: Child or supervisor trips over toys.
checklist_item.advice: Agreement: Clean up toys when done with them.

checklist_item.name: Speelgoed: Kind krijgt poppenhuis op zich
checklist_item.description: Toys: Child gets a dollhouse on top of them.
checklist_item.advice: N/A

checklist_item.name: Verbranding: Kind heeft toegang tot lucifers/aansteker
checklist_item.description: Burns: Child has access to matches/lighter.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure any matches/lighters are stored out of reach of children. If possible, remove matches and lighters from the premises.

checklist_item.name: Verbranding: Kind verbrandt zich aan warmwaterkraan
checklist_item.description: Burns: Child burns itself using hot water.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure children can only use hot water when supervised. Use cold water or thermostatically regulated water in bathrooms.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind wordt door huisdier gebeten
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child gets bitten by a pet.
checklist_item.advice: Disallow pets.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind stikt in stukje eten
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child chokes on food.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure children eat calmly. Make sure all supervisors are BHV certified.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: Kind draait zich van de aankleedtafel af
checklist_item.description: Changing table: Child turns away from the changing table.
checklist_item.advice: Place the table in such a way that there is a wall to one side. No child goes on the table unsupervised.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: Kind rolt aan de achterkant van de aankleedtafel af
checklist_item.description: Changing table: Child rolls of the table backwards.
checklist_item.advice: Place the table in such a way that there is a wall to one side. No child goes on the table unsupervised.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: Kind stoot zich aan (scherpe) hoek van de aankleedtafel
checklist_item.description: Changing table: Child hits a (sharp edge) on the table.
checklist_item.advice: Place corner protectors.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: De aankleedtafel is niet stabiel en valt om
checklist_item.description: Changing table: The table is not stable and falls over.
checklist_item.advice: Buy a decent table.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: De aankleedtafel is niet stevig en stort in
checklist_item.description: Changing table: The table is not stable and collapses.
checklist_item.advice: Buy a decent table.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: Een opklapbare aankleedtafel klapt tijdens gebruik in
checklist_item.description: Changing table: A fold-able changing table folds while being used.
checklist_item.advice: Buy a decent table.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: Kind komt in hoogte verstelbare aankleedtafel bekneld te zitten
checklist_item.description: Changing table: Child gets stuck in a height adjustable changing table.
checklist_item.advice: Set the height without children present. Children are only to on the table when supervised.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: Kind valt van trapje van aankleedtafel
checklist_item.description: Changing table: Child falls from steps of table.
checklist_item.advice: Children are only to on the table when supervised. When not in use, fold up the steps.

checklist_item.name: Ankleedtafel: Kind klautert zonder toezicht op aankleedtafel
checklist_item.description: Changing table: Child climbs onto table unsupervised.
checklist_item.advice: Fold up stairs so a child cannot get onto the table unsupervised.

checklist_item.name: Giftige Stoffen: Kind heeft toegang tot lotions of alcohol
checklist_item.description: Toxic substances: Child has access to lotions or alcohol.
checklist_item.advice: Keep lotions and soaps etc. out of reach of children.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind snuffelt in afvalbakje
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child is going through the trash.
checklist_item.advice: Use a bin with a cover, empty the bin daily.

checklist_item.name: Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet van toiletblokje
checklist_item.description: Toxic substances: Child eats toilet block.
checklist_item.advice: Do not use a toilet block.

checklist_item.name: Verbranding: Kind brandt zich aan kookplaat
checklist_item.description: Burns: Child burns itself on stove.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure children do not have access to any stoves. Try not to cook in the presence of children.

checklist_item.name: Verbranding: Kind trekt pan van het fornuis
checklist_item.description: Burns: Child pulls pan from the stove.
checklist_item.advice: Try not to cook in the presence of children.

checklist_item.name: Verbranding: Kind brandt zich aan oven
checklist_item.description: Burns: Child burns itself on an oven.
checklist_item.advice: Try not to cook in the presence of children, make sure children do not have access to any ovens.

checklist_item.name: Verbranding: Kind loopt brandworden op door de waterkoker over zich heen te trekken
checklist_item.description: Burns: Child burns itself by pulling a water boiler onto itself.
checklist_item.advice: Place water boilers in such a way that children cannot reach it, e.g the back of a counter-top.

checklist_item.name: Verbranding: Kind krijgt hete thee over zich heen
checklist_item.description: Burns: Child gets burned by hot tea.
checklist_item.advice: Place any cups of tea far away on the table. Do not drink tea with a child on your lap.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind trekt plastic zak over het hoofd
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child pulls a plastic bag over its head.
checklist_item.advice: Keep plastic bags out of reach of children.

checklist_item.name: Giftige Stoffen: Kind eet toner van kopieermachine op
checklist_item.description: Toxic substances: Child eats toner of a copier.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure children cannot get to copiers.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind snijdt zich aan kantoorartikelen
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child cuts itself on office paraphernalia.
checklist_item.advice: Keep children away from office paraphernalia.

checklist_item.name: Giftige Stoffen: Kind krijgt giftige stoffen binnen omdat voedsel naast gevaarlijke stoffen wordt opgeborgen
checklist_item.description: Toxic substances: Child ingests toxic substance because food is stored next to it.
checklist_item.advice: N/A

checklist_item.name: Berging: Kind klimt in wasdroger/machine
checklist_item.description: Storage: Child climbs into washer/drier.
checklist_item.advice: N/A

checklist_item.name: Berging: Kind verbrandt zich aan de cv-ketel
checklist_item.description: Storage: Child burns itself on boiler.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure children have no access to the boiler (usually these are in a separate room).

checklist_item.name: Berging: Kind bezeert zich aan opgeslagen speelgoed/materiaal
checklist_item.description: Storage: Child hurts itself on stored toys.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure the storage is clean and orderly.

checklist_item.name: Berging: Kind bezeert zich aan gereedschap
checklist_item.description: Storage: Child hurts itself on tools.
checklist_item.advice: Store tools out of reach of children after usage.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind valt van toestel
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child falls from a playset.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure the floor is made from a soft material like rubber tiles or grass.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind valt door defect materiaal
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child falls due to defective material.
checklist_item.advice: Check material monthly, repair or replace when necessary.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind komt met nek klem te zitten traptreden
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child gets neck stuck between steps.
checklist_item.advice: Steps need to be in accordance with prescribed distances.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind verwondt zich aan scherpe randen
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child hurts itself on sharp edges.
checklist_item.advice: Check material monthly, repair or replace when necessary.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Vinger komt klem te zitten bij schommel
checklist_item.description: Playground: Finger gets stuck in swingset.
checklist_item.advice: Place protection.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind raakt bekneld tussen veerwip
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child gets stuck in the spring of a seesaw.
checklist_item.advice: N/A

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind valt van de veerwip door defect materiaal
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child falls from seesaw due to faulty material.
checklist_item.advice: N/A

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind blijft met koordje/ketting hangen
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child gets caught in a cord/necklace.
checklist_item.advice: Cords need to comply with maximum length prescriptions.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind krijgt splinter in hand
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child gets a splinter in their hand.
checklist_item.advice: Check material monthly, repair or replace when necessary.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind struikelt over speeltoestel
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child trips over playset.
checklist_item.advice: Create and maintain sufficient walking space.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind botst tegen een speeltoestel
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child runs into a playset.
checklist_item.advice: Create and maintain sufficient walking space.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind botst tegen ander kind op schommel
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child hits another child on swings.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure swings are only used under supervision.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Vinger van kind komt klem in holle buis
checklist_item.description: Playground: Finger gets stuck in a hollow tube.
checklist_item.advice: If necessary cover up the hole.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind snijdt zich aan zwerfvuil in de zandbak
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child cuts itself on stray trash in sandpit.
checklist_item.advice: Cover the sand when unused, check for trash daily, replace sand once a year.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind stoot zich tegen rand van de zandbak
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child hits the edge of a sandpit.
checklist_item.advice: Create and maintain sufficient walking space, make sure the pit is smooth.

checklist_item.name: Speeltoestel: Kind botst tegen veerwip
checklist_item.description: Playground: Child runs into a seesaw.
checklist_item.advice: N/A

checklist_item.name: Omheining: Kind doet poortje van het hek open en rent de straat op
checklist_item.description: Fencing: Child opens fence gate and runs into the street.
checklist_item.advice: Keep the fence locked.

checklist_item.name: Omheining: Het hek blijft openstaan en kind loopt de straat op
checklist_item.description: Fencing: The fence gate is left open and a child walks into the street.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure the fence remains locked.

checklist_item.name: Omheining: Kind bezeert zich aan omheining
checklist_item.description: Fencing: Child hurts itself on the fence.
checklist_item.advice: Check the fence monthly and repair it when needed.

checklist_item.name: Omheining: Kind kruipt onder de omheining en komt klem te zitten
checklist_item.description: Fencing: Child tries to crawl under the fence and gets stuck.
checklist_item.advice: The space under a fence has to conform to prescribed heights.

checklist_item.name: Omheining: Kind kruipt tussen de spijlen en komt klem te zitten
checklist_item.description: Fencing: Child tries to move between the bars of a fence and gets stuck.
checklist_item.advice: Bars need to conform to prescribed spacing.

checklist_item.name: Omheining: Kind klimt op de omheining en valt
checklist_item.description: Fencing: Child climbs the fence and falls.
checklist_item.advice: Do not place any elevations near fences.

checklist_item.name: Omheining: Kind klimt over de omheining
checklist_item.description: Fencing: Child climbs over the fence.
checklist_item.advice: Do not place elevations near fences.

checklist_item.name: Ondergrond: Kind struikelt over een boomwortel
checklist_item.description: Ground: Child trips over a tree root.
checklist_item.advice: Remove the tree root/replace the tiles.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind rent tegen een obstakel
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child runs into an obstacle.
checklist_item.advice: Create and maintain sufficient walking space.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind botst tegen een ander kind
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: One child runs into another.
checklist_item.advice: Create and maintain sufficient walking space. Do not allow children to run.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind bezeert zich aan zwerfvuil
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child hurts itself on stray trash.
checklist_item.advice: Check for trash daily and remove it.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind wordt omver gelopen
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: A child is knocked down.
checklist_item.advice: Create and maintain walking space, make sure children play calmly.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind verbrandt zich in de zon
checklist_item.description: Miscellaneous: Child gets burned playing in the sun.
checklist_item.advice: Have children put on sunscreen and don't let them play outside in the scorching sun.

checklist_item.name: Overig: Kind raakt te water
checklist_item.description: Child falls into a body of water.
checklist_item.advice: Make sure the gate is closed and always supervise children.

checklist_item.name: Omgeving: Kind moet oversteken tussen geparkeerde autos
checklist_item.description: Environment: Child has to cross the road between parked cars.
checklist_item.advice: Children only cross the road under supervision.

checklist_item.name: Omgeving: Kind rent de weg op als het wordt opgehaald
checklist_item.description: Environment: Child runs onto the road when picked up.
checklist_item.advice: Children are supervised when leaving.

checklist_item.name: Omgeving: Kind raakt betrokken bij ongeval bij een uitstapje buiten de deur
checklist_item.description: Environment: Child gets involved in an accident during an outdoors trip.
checklist_item.advice: Transport the child using legally prescribed seats to the nearest hospital.
